resources.string: Click \"Generate\" to randomly generate contents about food.\n\nNote: Contents will be shown as notification.
Food is symbolic of love when words are inadequate
My weaknesses have always been food and men - in that order.
Life is uncertain. Eat dessert first.
Never eat more than you can life.
A recipe has no soul. You, as the cook, must bring soul to the recipe.
Food for us comes from our relatives, wheter they have wings or fins or roots. That is how we consider food. Food has a culture. It has a history. It has a story. It has relationships.
